description: Represents the tool annotations as they can be optionally defined for MCP tools.

destructiveHint.description: If true, the tool may perform destructive updates.
destructiveHint.title: destructiveHint

idempotentHint.description: If true, repeated calls with same args have no additional effect.
idempotentHint.title: idempotentHint

openWorldHint.description: If true, tool interacts with external entities.
openWorldHint.title: openWorldHint

readOnlyHint.description: If true, the tool does not modify its environment.
readOnlyHint.title: readOnlyHint

title: MCPToolAnnotations
